verbs.description: [V: Receiving] [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-PRP: for a state visit at the White House] , [ARG0: President Trump] repeated his criticism of the agreement to freeze Iran 's nuclear program , saying it does n't address Tehran 's missile program or its attempts to foment unrest in the region .
